@rachelandrew @Geek_Manager @anna_debenham @snyksec I'm in. I've been gradually increasing the range of things to which I add Marmite. By and large, if it includes toast, the toast has marmite on it. Beans? Cheese? Scrambled egg? Boiled egg? Poached egg? Yup, yup, yup, yup, yup!
